11112221212122.content: Tails knew he would be able to get in easy thanks to being a Freedom Fighter what was the most difficult thing however was the security systems with the most problematic being the AI that was often around Sally: Nicole. "I came to speak with the princess." Tails announced to the two guards who were in front of the entrance of the throne room, without a question they stepped out of the way and opened the door to walk in only shutting the door once he was inside. Tails knew this room was one of the few locations in the entire castle without security cameras so if he were to initiate Sally it would be here or somewhere away from the castle but considering Sally was already in the room on the throne ahead of him going through paperwork it was now or never.
11112221212122.title: he gets allowed inside from the security cameras

sally wants to do her work    hmmmmm might need to try some other strategy

1111222121212221.content: "Mind if I help you?" The princess would look up from the work in surprise, seems she was so wrapped up into it that she didn't even notice Tails entering the room. "Oh I would love your help." Tails smirked as flew over to her side as she leaned toward him to show him one sheet of paper as he reached down with one hand to place the chip onto Sally's neck, "What was-" The princess was suddenly silenced as the chip activated, it's color changing to match the fur of her neck so it would only be noticed if someone touched it. "Congratulations on being the first member of my harem Sally."

"Sally I want you to get back to your work as if nothing happened, I need to get more harem members." The princess would nod as she buried herself back into her work as the fox walked out and thought of who was next...

111122212121222121.content: Tails knew he needed to take out the digital AI Nicole next as she was the most likely able to free Sally from his control thus ruining his fun but having the princess under his control meant he would have easy access to Nicole’s main console so he could recode her programming straight at the source. “Sally where did you put Nicole?” “The princess would take a few seconds before responding, “I left her in the office of the castle so I could have her go through massive paperwork that needed to be worked through, she is much faster at it and none of it was necessarily an emergency for me to attend to so I figured it was best she got it done.” Tails simply nodded in response as he figured that she would need to be commanded later on to get to the point faster but he was too focused on getting Nicole to worry about that for now as he flew to the office and calmly searched around the place until he heard Nicole’s familiar voice. “Can I help you Tails?” The fox turned around to see Nicole in front of a bookshelf pulling out a rather dusty book while her console was on a wooden desk a foot away. “Nicole I came to put updates into your system so if you wouldn’t mind can I access you?”

112.content: So you have a hole that needs to be filled by a peg. Were you like that in the series?
112.title: Female

11212.content: And who wouldn't want to be a sexy Jewel thief bat. After a successful heist you return home to admire your haul. Not having the time to see what you grabbed as you dodged lazer beams, narrowly avoided spike pits, and out ran boulders; you just grabbed what you could and hauled ass from one location to the next on you week long raid of Mobius. Your first target was the castle of that goody two shoes Sally where you stole her personal jewelry box, more to rile her up than for personal gain. Next you broke into an ancient temple to some goddess of love and snatched something off a pedestal before temple started to collapse. Lastly you broke into Eggman's base and snatched anything remotely shiny while being chased by security bots. Man you had a full week and you couldn't wait to relax and check out your loot. Which do you take out first?
11212.title: Rouge the Bat

112121.content: You chuckled when you thought of Sally's expression when she finds her precious royal jewelry box missing. You then pick up said jewelry box and weigh it in your hand "Hmm, must be at least a pound, must be packed full of goodies." You grin and set it on the table and open it to reveal flawless gold and silver jewelry and your eyes light up as you thrust your hands into the box; sifting them around greedily "Oh yes, yes, yes I hit the jackp . . . ot?" you stop sifting your hands around feeling something strange beneath all of the other jewelry so you pull it out and stare at it with a vacant expression on your face. In your hands your are holding . . .
112121.title: Royal Jewelry box

choices: A ring emitting a strange glow, similar to a chaos emerald

You find yourself unable to think and your body moves on its own putting the ring on your finger, a perfect fit, strange considering it is Sally's but you have no time to finish that thought when . . .
11212121.title: A ring emitting a strange glow, similar to a ch...

choices: Change into one of the girls and seduce a guy.

112121211.content: Your body is inveloped in the pink light and you find your usually tight fitting clothing fall slack and slip off your body. Quickly you run to a mirror and look into it. You gasp in horror at the sight. Standing in the mirror was no longer the busty, curvy fem fatale of a bat but instead was the slim petite form of a certain princess and freedom fighter. Yes standing in your place was none other than Sally Acorn. "Wh-what on Mobius is going on here!" you exclaim, even your voice had changed. You look at the ring and see an inscription "Ring of Form" the name sounded familiar so you run to your bookshelf and grab a book on artifacts and instantly find a passage talking about it. "The ring of form allows the wearer to take on the form whomever they think about." You stopped reading and grinned thinking about your true form, changing you back "Oh this is going to be fun."
112121211.title: The ring transforms you!

choices: "Come over here and please your mistress" (straight sex)
112121212111.content: Suddenly Sonic bursts into the door snapping you out of your trance. "What the hell!" you yell as Sonic stops in the middle of the living room and stares you down. You shake your head once and clear your mind before smiling at him seductively, "Hi suga' if you wanted to see little ol' me you just had to knock." A light blush runs across Sonic's face before he yells "C-cut it out Rouge I'm here for the stuff you stole from Sally." "Oh? and what stuff would that be?" you ask before realizing that your loot is still on the table. Sonic sees it and runs over to it "I'll be taking this." he said picking up the heavy sack and making his way towards the door when you yell "Stop!" as you yell the command the ring's pink light fills the room and Sonic drops the sack and turns towards you and says in a monotone empty voice "Yes, mistress, I am at your command." You look at the ring and grin before telling him . . .
112121212111.title: Sonic

1121212121112.content:
“Be a dearie and go fetch me another slave will you?” Rouge suggested.

“Yes, Mistress.” Sonic said softly before the hypnotized blue hedgehog sprinted out to go get another slave for his mistress.

“A ring that can get me slaves just by hypnotizing then? I kinda really like this thing. This could beat the chaos emeralds almost any day.” Rouge said to herself as she admired the power she now possessed.

She waited for Sonic to return for a while until she sees him back with Knuckles all tied up and struggling before he puts him down on the floor.

“Well done, Sonic. You catched me a good one.” Rouge said.

“Rouge!? I should’ve known you were behind this! What have you done to Sonic!? And why did you have him drag me all the way over here like this!?” Knuckles demanded and explanation.

“What I’ve done to him is the exact reason why you’re here now, my dear Knuckles. I’m going to hypnotize you with this very ring and you’ll become my little slave.” Rouge explained.

“Like that’ll ever happen!” Knuckles defied her.

“I’m afraid that you don’t really have much of a choice in the matter.” Rouge said as she uses the ring.

Soon, Knuckles becomes hypnotic like Sonic and Rouge unties him to let him stand back up.

“Now, who do you serve?” Rouge asked seductively.

“You, my mistress.” Knuckles said in the same hypnotic way as Sonic.

“Good. Now then,....”
1121212121112.title: "Go bring me another slave"

choices: "I want you to be my servant for this weekend."

112121212112.content: Suddenly a knock at your door snaps you out of your trance and you quickly hide away your loot before yelling "It's unlocked" then standing before you was tails, the cute little fox, "H-hi miss rouge." he says nervously. You softly grin at the sight of the cutie before you and greet him "Hello, what can I do for you cutie." Your words only make him blush more and he stutters "U-um, I-I was wondering if i could borrow a gem, I need one for a machine I am building." "Hmm, maybe, but nothing is free, how about we discuss the terms of our arrangement over some coffee." You propose to him while walking towards the kitchen "Umm, okay I guess." the adorable young fox says before sitting on a couch as you come back in holding a two cups of coffee. As he takes a sip of his coffee you say "Now about the terms . . ."
112121212112.title: Tails

info.brief_description: Play as a character from Sonic the Hedgehog have naughty fun. Anything goes.
info.description:
In this story you get to choose a character from the Sonic series, any character whether they be from the games, comics, or TV show humans included. This is a SEX story and as such there will be sex. Anything Goes!

Rewards for good chapters, you get what you give.

General Rule for adding chapters:
- Try to keep chapter length to at least a paragraph, unless a one liner absolutely unavoidable such as when a previous option directly leads to a new question.
- When adding a new chapter make sure you add an additional "others" option at the bottom so that someone else can put their ideas into the story.
- No ending paths because you do not like where the story is heading. As stated above there should be an "other" option for you to change the path of the story if you so desire.
- If you do change the path of the story do so in a way that builds off the previous chapter, i.e. no starting a whole new story in the middle of a path.
- Try to keep the story going and try to add onto any unopened paths before going to other.
-No troll posts. =_= You know what I mean.

Content rules:
- Like I said in the intro anything goes; however in the interest of not killing any boners or drying any vajayjays please put a disclaimer in the description of sex scenes telling any special kinks, for example (foot), (gay), (lesbian), (inflation), ( *type of expansion*), (underage), ect.

This is both my first story and first interactive story so please be gentle.
